item.description:
Catch up over lunch on the middle day of the middle of every month! Depending on who wants to go, we can decide on a venue that works for all of us. We have so far met at

  • Super 88 food court - BRIGHTON (August 11)
  • Fuji 1546 - QUINCY (September 11)
  • Porter Square Exchange - CAMBRIDGE (October 11)
    This area is the Little Japan of Boston. There is plenty of parking and a really neat toy store (Henry Bear's Park) in the complex. Let's meet in front of Cafe Mami and take it from there.
item.name: Ladies Who Lunch
